sacred.translation[0].definitions[0].def: relating to a god or religion
sacred.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the miraculous powers of sacred relics
The land is sacred to these tribesmen.
sacred.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Frontiers which have held for over forty years are no longer sacred.
He had no respect for everything I held sacred.
Few things were sacred to Henry, but local history was one of them.
